page.title: 05ONE WEEKEND AT BARNSTON
page.content: On Saturday I usually get up at half seven and wake up my sister.Then we have our breakfast.Then we fetch our swimming kit and catch the quarter to nine bus to Heswall and then we get the bus to West Kirby if it hasn't already gone. We stay in the Concourse swimming pool for about half an hour then we go home and play in the Dales. On Sunday my sister and I often go to Sunday School.When we come home I take my dog out.My mum cooks the dinner while my dad cuts the lawn. Sometimes after dinner we go out to somewhere like Llandudno. We come back for tea and then we sometimes wash our hair and have a bath.
